page.title: 07The Garden Centre.
page.content: One of the biggest employers in Walsden is Gordon Rigg & Son, with their nursery. During the summer more than 30,000 people visit the garden centre from all parts of Lancashire and Yorkshire. It is one of the largest and best garden centres in the North of England. They grow bedding plants by the million and cater for all kinds of people, the amateur gardener to the connoisseur; the man with a small garden who just wants a few plants, to the professional. While an industrial area might not be the ideal setting it is well placed for customers, sitting as it does in the middle of a highly populated area. The nursery has everything you could possibly want for your garden from shears to sheds, from greenhouses to grass-seeds.
